title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), hereby order as
heading: 2. The 21st day of August 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 21st day of August 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than subsections (1), (2) and (4) of section 5; 

(b) Part 2; 

(c) Part 3; 

(d) Part 4, other than sections 23, 24 and 25; 

(e) Part 5, other than section 32. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 August, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [306] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
